awd_titl_txt: Production of Carbon Fibers Using Iron Catalysts
awd_abstract_narration: The project deals with the measurements of the kinetics of the                  production of carbon fibers using iron catalysts.  It will incorporate          physical characterization of the catalyst, support, and the carbon              formed along with the analysis of the reactive gas phase.  A                    kinetic/mechanistic model of the process will be developed.                     Carbon fibers have high strength and modulus and low weight.  They are          therfore used for high strength light weight structural components.             The project has the potential for a new process for growing filamentous         carbon fibers catalytically.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.inst_name: SUNY State University of New York Central Administration
